    • Method Detail

      • accelerateAtAngle

        public void accelerateAtAngle(float angle)
        Update accelerate vector by angle and value stored in acceleration field. Acceleration is applied by applyPhysics method.
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle (degrees) in which to accelerate.
        See Also:
        acceleration, #applyPhysics

      • getMotionAngle

        public float getMotionAngle()
        Get the angle of motion (in degrees), calculated from the velocity vector.
        To align actor image angle with motion angle, use setRotation( getMotionAngle() ).
        Returns:
        angle of motion (degrees)

      • getSpeed

        public float getSpeed()
        Calculates the speed of movement (in pixels/second).
        Returns:
        speed of movement (pixels/second)

      • isMoving

        public boolean isMoving()
        Determines if this object is moving (if speed is greater than zero).
        Returns:
        false when speed is zero, true otherwise

      • setMotionAngle

        public void setMotionAngle(float angle)
        Sets the angle of motion (in degrees). If current speed is zero, this will have no effect.
        Parameters:
        angle - of motion (degrees)

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(float speed)
        Set the speed of movement (in pixels/second) in current direction. If current speed is zero (direction is undefined), direction will be set to 0 degrees.
        Parameters:
        speed - of movement (pixels/second)

      • update

        public void update(float deltaTime)
        Update position based on velocity and acceleration.
